original_title: Alexander and the Terrible, Horrible, No Good, Very Bad Day
overview: What a day Alexander is having. He's got gum stuck in his hair, he trips on his skateboard and he can't find his favorite glow-in-the-dark yo-yo. Things go from bad to worse in this charming animated musical based on the book by Judith Viorst.
title: Alexander and the Terrible, Horrible, No Good, Very Bad Day
